casebody.data:
No. 11,

Original.

United States v. Louisiana. Solicitor General Rankin for the United States, plaintiff. Jack P. F. Gremillion, Attorney General, W. Scott Wilkinson, Edward M. Car-*922mouche and John L. Madden, Special Assistant Attorneys General, Bailey Walsh, Hugh M, Wilkinson and Victor A. Sachse for the State of Louisiana, defendant.

*921The Solicitor General is allowed 10 days within which to file a reply to the answer filed by the State of Louisiana.

The Chief Justice took no part in the consideration or decision of this question.
